column1: Clinical Notes
Pt came with hdache and vomtng aftr lunch.
Bp was high in mrng and low aftrnoon.
Tab paracetml prscrbd for fevr and body pain.
Sugr lvl tested aftr brkfst, found elevated.
Vomtng noted twice aftr taking tab on empty stomach.
Pt reports cold, cough, and mild fevr for 2 days.
Chckd sugr lvl before brkfst using glucometer.
Tab prscrbd to be taken aftr lunch and dinner.
Hdache and nausea persisted despite taking tab.
Doc advised sugr control and regular chckups.
Pt had paracetml tab in mrng but fevr persisted.
Sugr lvl high aftr meals, especially dinner.
Vomtng and dizziness reported during evng.
Paracetml taken aftr hdache due to stress.
Pt didn’t take brkfst and vomtng followed.
Cold symptoms with mild fevr noted by nurse.
Bp chckd thrice, high readings all day.
Tab skipped in mrng; hdache worsened later.
Sugr lvl dropped rapidly aftr insulin dose.
Tab taken regularly, but still hdache daily.
